Package org.geotoolkit.coverage.wkb

Class WKBRasterWriter

java.lang.Object
org.geotoolkit.coverage.wkb.WKBRasterWriter
public class WKBRasterWriter extends Object
WKB Raster Writer, used in postGIS 2 but can be used elsewhere.
Author:
Johann Sorel (Geomatys)
